          <title>
            <string language="en">Toms Diner - Reviewing the present progressive Tense</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Toms Restaurant - Wiederholen des anwesenden

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Wagon-restaurant de Toms - passer en revue le

            <string language="x-mt-it">Diner di Toms - rivedere il tempo progressivo

            <string language="x-mt-el">Γευματίζων Toms - που αναθεωρεί τον παρόντα

progresivo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A worksheet for students reviewing the present progressive Tense, based on the song Tom's Diner</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Una hoja de trabajo para los estudiantes que
